comment._content: That top building looks like an old building that sits on Newgate Street and Popeshead Street...but it also looks like one that was on St. Mary's Street and Temple Street. Hmmm!

comment.author: 87355012@N06
comment._content: No, this is the old library and it was located on lower High Street and opposite the current Post Office. Downstairs was the Treasury which now on upper High Street.

comment._content: Rasta Binkie is correct, west of what was (Bank of Antigua) opposite the post office, this building was knock down over 10 years now.
